1644700.name: Magic Boy
1644700.description:
Little Hewlett is top of his class at Sorcery school. One evening he stays behind to finish some work and accidently lets the grand wizard collection of grazy pets out of the basement. Can you help Hewlett get them all back before his master returns in the morning. Warning! this platform game is extremly addictive!

Good luck, it's going to be a long night.

  • 4 graphically stunning areas to explore, each with its own individual inhabitants.

  • 64 levels, 4 of which can be accessed at any one time.

  • 32 bonus packed secret levels for Hewlett to find and explore.

  • Hidden features; extra powers for Hewletts wand, invincibilty potions, hidden blocks, extra lives and extra continues.

  • Progressive difficulty level.

  • Password system to access later levels.

  • Superb cartoon animation.

If Hewlett is to return life to normal at the Sorcery School he is going to need all of his agility and cunning, as well as a touch of Magic!
1644700.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
